error-welcome-page.title: Welcome
error-welcome-page.description: Welcome to your new PBCMS site!
error-welcome-page.content-1:
Welcome to your new PCBMS instance, this is a small introduction page.
Start by signin in to your account and by exploring the dashboard!
error-welcome-page.content-2: By the way, this page is only shown because it is enabled by default when no homepage exist. You can disable it or create a homepage.

error-404.title: Page not found
error-404.description: The requested page does not exist.

error-403.title: Forbidden access
error-403.description: You do not have access to the requested page.

pb-error.subtitle: An error occurred while processing your request.

create-session.error-user_locked: The user you are trying to create a session for has been locked by the system or an administrator.
create-session.error-token_error: An error occured while creating the refresh-token.
create-session.error-invalid_password: An invalid password has been provided for the user identified by {{IDENTIFIER}}.
create-session.error-unknown_user: A user identified by {{IDENTIFIER}} does not exist.

access-token.error-session_expired: The requested session has since expired.
access-token.error-user_locked: The user you are trying to request an access token for has been locked by the system or an administrator.
access-token.error-token_error: An error occured while creating the access-token.
access-token.error-unknown_user: The user you are trying to request an access token for does not exist anymore.
access-token.error-unknown_session: The requested session does not exist.
access-token.error-decode_error: An error occured while decoding the refresh token.
